30020000.Original_Text: 준비가 끝나신 분은 탑승 수속을 \n완료해주시기 바랍니다!
30020000.English_Text:
If you are ready,
please complete your check-in!
30020000.Chinese_Text:
做好准备的乘客
请办理乘船手续！

30020001.Original_Text: 다시 배가 망가지는 일은 없어야 할 텐데...
30020001.English_Text: I hope the ship won't get damaged again.
30020001.Chinese_Text: 希望不要再遇到船被毁掉的事故...

30020002.Original_Text: 아, 누님. 그러지말고 조금만 나눠주세요.\n하루 이틀 본 사이도 아닌데...
30020002.English_Text:
Could you give me some of that?
Please take into account how long we've known each other...
30020002.Chinese_Text:
难道要我请来<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>浩龙</>大人，你才会让步？！
先发现<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>的是我。

30020003.Original_Text: 에헤이. 나도 어렵게 구한 거라니까 그러네?\n이제 좀 그만 보채게!
30020003.English_Text:
Hey, I told you that I had a hard time getting my hands on this, too.
Stop whining!
30020003.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>月光疾风</>大人也不是好惹的！
你别想拿<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>压我！
最后赶走<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>的可是我！

30020004.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 녀석들은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>을 공급해 준다더니\n왜 아직도 소식이 없는 거야!?
30020004.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> said they'd get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>,
so why haven't I heard from them yet?
30020004.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>那些家伙不是说会供应<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>吗？
为什么到现在还没有消息？！

30020005.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 요즘 통 보이질 않네.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</>에는 오지 않기로 한 건가?
30020005.English_Text:
I haven't seen the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> recently.
Did they decide not to come to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>?
30020005.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派最近完全不见踪影呢。
难道他们已决定不来<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>？

30020006.English_Text:
Welcome!
What are you looking for?
30020006.Chinese_Text:
欢迎光临~！
您在找什么？

30020007.English_Text: Hmm, I don't think I have that.

30020008.Original_Text: 이거 원, 직접 가서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>을 구해야 하나?
30020008.English_Text: Do I have to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> myself?
30020008.Chinese_Text: 唉，难道要亲手去搜集<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>吗？

30020009.English_Text:
It's been a month since I ate <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine... grass</>, meow.

30020010.English_Text:
Hmm, I'm afraid we're running out of stock.
What should we do?
30020010.Chinese_Text:
唔...库存远远不够吧？
这该怎么办...

30020011.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>거점 북부</>에 널려있습니다.\n못 찾는 게 이상할 정도라니까요?
30020011.English_Text:
There's a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>north of the base</>.
It'd be difficult to miss them.
30020011.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿角大鬼</>遍布于<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>据点北部</>。
不可能找不到。

30020012.English_Text:
I love <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>!
I love it! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>!

30020013.English_Text:
Morale among <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>members</> is so low.
It seems the reinforcements from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>home</> are still so far away.
30020013.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>队员</>们的士气这么低落。
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>本国</>的增员还遥遥无期吗...

30020014.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>감시탑</>의 남겨진 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>물자</>를 옮겨야 하는데...\n하, 다들 바쁘니 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>용병</>이라도 써야 하는 건가?
30020014.English_Text:
We have to move the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>supplies</> left at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>watchtower</>,
but everyone's busy. Hah, maybe I should hire a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>mercenary</>?
30020014.Chinese_Text:
我们需要搬走<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>监视塔</>内剩下的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>物资</>...
唉，大家都这么忙，是否该雇佣<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>佣兵</>？

30020015.Original_Text: 이런 쥐꼬리만 한 녹으로 어떻게 집을 사?
30020015.English_Text: How can I buy a house with such a small salary?
30020015.Chinese_Text: 这么微薄的薪酬怎么可能买得起房子？

30020016.English_Text: I wish money just fell from the sky.
30020016.Chinese_Text: 有没有什么大发横财的机会呢？

30020017.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비의 숲</>이라고 했습니까? 허허, 이거 참.\n그래서 지금 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>단원</>들이 찾고 있다구요?
30020017.English_Text:
Did you say the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Scarlet Masks Forest</>? Haha, oh my.
Some <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>members</> are looking for it?
30020017.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>赤匪森林</>吗？呵呵，真是的。
所以团员们<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>正在</>寻找？

30020018.Original_Text: 일이 그렇게 되었습니다....\n그, 이번에 들어온 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신입</> 있지 않습니까.
30020018.English_Text:
That's what happened.
Umm, you know that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>new recruit</> the other day?
30020018.Chinese_Text:
事情就是这样...
那个，不是有一个最近刚加入的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>新手嘛</>。

30020019.Original_Text: 섣불리 움직였다가는... 낭패를 보겠군요.\n알겠습니다. 방도를 찾아보지요.
30020019.English_Text:
It'd be unwise to move recklessly.
I understand the situation, so I'll find a way.
30020019.Chinese_Text:
若轻举妄动...很容易吃亏。
知道了，我会另寻办法。

30020020.English_Text:
They'll come if we wait here?
What is the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> thinking?
30020020.Chinese_Text:
在这里等待就可以吗...？
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>团长</>到底在想什么？

30020021.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>단장</>님 생각대로 일이 진행되려나...?\n에이 됐다. 나는 그냥 시키는대로 하면 되겠지.
30020021.English_Text:
Will things work out the way our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> expected?
Eh, whatever. I just need to do my job.
30020021.Chinese_Text:
事情会如<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>团长</>所愿吗...？
唉，算了。我只需要奉命行事。

30020022.Original_Text: 아이고 무릎이야...\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>운반해</> 녀석이 그래도 살려는 줬네. 다행이다...
30020022.English_Text:
Ow, my knees! 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Unvane</> did keep me alive. That's a relief.
30020022.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，我的膝盖...
好歹让<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>云半海</>那家伙救了下来。太好了...

30020023.Original_Text: 그래도 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이랑 원만히 지내야 좋을 텐데...\n생각했던 대로 흘러가지 않아 걱정이구만.
30020023.English_Text:
But we do need to be on good terms with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
I'm worried since things aren't going our way.
30020023.Chinese_Text:
但不管如何，跟<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>搞好关系还是有好处的...
事情没有按照预期的发展，真令人担心。

30020024.Original_Text: 참 흥미로운 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소협</>이야.\n나도 저럴 때가 있었는데! 힘내자 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>!
30020024.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>They</>'re very interesting.
I was like them once! Good luck, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>!
30020024.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>这少侠</>真是有趣。
我过去也曾一样！加油吧，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>！

30020025.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>늪지</>로 갔던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>일꾼</>들은 왜 오지 않는 거지?\n혹시 무슨 일이라도 당한 건가...
30020025.English_Text:
Why aren't the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>workers</> who went to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>swamp</> back yet?
Did something terrible happen?
30020025.Chinese_Text:
去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沼泽</>的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>工人</>们为什么还不回来？
难道遇到了什么事...

30020026.English_Text:
A <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>? I only read about how to make one from a book.
Uh, I'm so nervous.
30020026.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>桃花镜</>啊...我只在书中读过制作方法而已...
唔，真让人紧张。

30020027.Original_Text: 휴... 성공했어! 근데 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>를 부르는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제사</>라니...\n 듣던 대로 대단한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소협</>이네.
30020027.English_Text:
Phew, it's a success! Anyways, a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</> that summons an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</>?
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You</>'re just as amazing as the rumors make you out to be.
30020027.Chinese_Text:
呼...成功了！召唤<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>神兽</>的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>吗...
果然和传闻一样是个了不起的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>少侠呀</>。

30020029.English_Text:
Oh! You guys! Don't you remember me?
Didn't we meet at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sapphire Basin</>?
30020029.Chinese_Text:
哟！你们！不认识我喵？！
我们曾在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>半月湖</>见过面吧喵？！

30020030.English_Text:
Save me!
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</> are so scary!
30020030.Chinese_Text:
救命喵！
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇头菇</>太可怕了喵！

30020031.English_Text:
Thank you!
You're my savior, meow!
30020031.Chinese_Text:
太感谢了喵！
真是救命恩人喵！

30020032.Original_Text: 다음부터는 일행이랑 떨어지지 말거라.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소협</>이 아니었으면 큰일 날 뻔했구나.
30020032.English_Text:
Don't get separated from your colleagues from now on.
You would have been in big trouble if not for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>them</>.
30020032.Chinese_Text:
下次不要离开一行人。
若不是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>少侠</>，差点就出大事了。

30020033.English_Text:
Tell me if you're ready.
This <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>old man</> will also make preparations.
30020033.Chinese_Text:
准备好了就说一声。
我这个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>老头</>也会做好准备。

30020034.Original_Text: 어쩌다 이런 길을 선택한 것입니까...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 역사상 최고의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주</>라고 생각했는데...
30020034.English_Text:
Why did you choose to do so?
I thought you were the greatest <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> in the history of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>.
30020034.Chinese_Text:
您为什么要做出这种选择呢...
我曾以为您是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>史上最伟大的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>门主</>呢...

30020035.English_Text:
Are you feeling better?
You shouldn't have strained yourself. Be careful.
30020035.Chinese_Text:
身体好些了吗？
做事要有分寸，以后多注意一下。

30020036.English_Text:
Yes, I feel better thanks to you.
I'll be more careful from now on!
30020036.Chinese_Text:
是...承蒙关照，现在好多了。
下次一定会注意！

30020037.Original_Text: 아이고, 이게 무슨 일이야.\n웬 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>들이 이렇게나 많은 거야!?
30020037.English_Text:
Oh my, what's up with all this?
Why are there so many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>illusions</>?
30020037.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，这是怎么回事？
怎么会有这么多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>幻影</>？！

30020038.Original_Text: 용케 찾아온 것을 보니 아주 애송이는 아니구나.\n마음의 준비는 되었느냐.
30020038.English_Text:
I see you're no novice since you've managed to get here.
Are you ready?
30020038.Chinese_Text:
竟然能找到这里，看来不是泛泛之辈。
做好心理准备了吗？

30020040.English_Text:
It's been a while, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>sir</>.
You're late again.
30020040.Chinese_Text:
好久不见~<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>门主</>大人。
不是说很快就到吗？这是怎么回事？

30020042.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 덕분에 한시름 덜었습니다.\n제가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>연구 대원</>들에게 전하겠습니다.
30020042.English_Text:
Thank you, that's a relief to hear.
I'll deliver the news to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>researchers</>.
30020042.Chinese_Text:
非常感谢。托您的福，我解决了一个心头大患。
我会把这件事转告<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>研究队员</>们。

30020043.English_Text: Oh, I think Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</> left this.
30020043.Chinese_Text: 咦，这不是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沸流河</>师兄留下的吗？

30020044.English_Text: Stop it. Get away from me.

30020045.English_Text:
I'll protect you.
Stay by my side!
30020045.Chinese_Text:
我，我会保护你。
不要离开我！

30020046.English_Text:
This isn't good.
When will I be able to get an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>?
30020046.Chinese_Text:
唉...真是受不了。
到底什么时候才能找到幻影魂火？

30020047.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</>...
Go and gather some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spitting Plant's sap</>.
30020047.Chinese_Text:
铁拳...
你去搜集一下透烟草的黏液。

30020048.English_Text:
Right! Th-there's
an <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>illusion</> next to the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spitting Plant</>!
30020048.Chinese_Text:
好！这个...
所，所以说透烟草旁边有幻影！
